foreignData.name: Wirbelnde Verweigerung
foreignData.text: Für jeden Zauberspruch und jede Fähigkeit, den bzw. die ein Gegner kontrolliert, neutralisiere ihn bzw. sie, es sei denn, sein bzw. ihr Beherrscher bezahlt {4}.

foreignData.name: Rechazo en torbellino
foreignData.text: Contrarresta cada hechizo y habilidad que controlan tus oponentes a menos que su controlador pague {4} por cada uno de ellos.

foreignData.name: Déni tourbillonnant
foreignData.text: Pour chaque sort et chaque capacité que vos adversaires contrôlent, contrecarrez-les à moins que son contrôleur ne paie {4}.

foreignData.name: Vortice di Negazione
foreignData.text: Per ogni magia e abilità controllata dai tuoi avversari, neutralizzala a meno che il suo controllore non paghi {4}.

foreignData.flavorText: 「だめだ、だめだ、それもだめだ。」
foreignData.name: 旋風のごとき否定
foreignData.text: 対戦相手がコントロールしている呪文や能力をそれぞれ、それのコントローラーが{4}を支払わないかぎり、打ち消す。

foreignData.name: 회오리치는 거부
foreignData.text: 당신의 상대가 조종하는 각 주문 및 능력마다, 그 조종자가 {4}를 지불하지 않는 한 그 주문 또는 능력을 무효화한다.

foreignData.name: Negação Vorticosa
foreignData.text: Para cada mágica ou habilidade que seus oponentes controlam, anule-a a menos que seu controlador pague {4}.

foreignData.name: Вихревой Отказ
foreignData.text: Для каждого заклинания и способности под контролем ваших оппонентов отмените то заклинание и способность, если контролирующий его (ее) игрок не заплатит {4}.

foreignData.name: 疾风拒斥
foreignData.text: 对每个由对手操控的咒语或异能而言，除非其操控者支付{4}，否则反击之。

foreignData.name: 疾風拒斥
foreignData.text: 對每個由對手操控的咒語或異能而言，除非其操控者支付{4}，否則反擊之。

name: Whirlwind Denial
originalText: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.

rulings.text: Among abilities, only activated and triggered abilities use the stack. Activated abilities are written in the form “[Cost]: [Effect].” Triggered abilities use the word “when,” “whenever,” or “at.” They're often written as “[Trigger condition], [effect].” Some keyword abilities are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder texts, and some keyword abilities are triggered abilities and will have “when,” “whenever,” or “at” in their reminder texts.

As Whirlwind Denial resolves, first the opponent whose turn it is (or, if it's your turn, the next opponent in turn order) chooses which spells and/or abilities to pay for, then pays that amount. Then each other opponent in turn order does the same. Then all spells and abilities that weren't paid for are countered at the same time.

text: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
